results.adx_keywords: Television;Comedy and Humor;internal-sub-only
results.title: Trevor Noah Is Tickled by Report of Trump Locking Supporters In
results.abstract: Noah joked that you know a club isn’t good “when you need a bouncer to keep people in,” after a report that some people at Trump’s 2024 campaign announcement were blocked from leaving.

media.caption: “I actually feel bad for the crowd,” Trevor Noah said. “They were probably scared as hell: ‘Oh, no, we’re trapped in here! Trump has locked us up! He’s locked us up! He’s locked us up!’”
media.copyright: Comedy Central

results.title: Lauren Boebert’s House race is nearing a recount.

results.title: Yale and Harvard Law Schools Withdraw From the U.S. News Rankings
results.abstract: Citing flaws in the way the ratings are determined, the schools said they will stop participating, breaking away from the rankings industry.

results.byline: By Ben Sisario and Madison Malone Kircher
results.title: Ticketmaster Cancels Sale of Taylor Swift Tickets After Snags
results.abstract: After a presale for the pop star’s Eras Tour ended in chaos earlier this week, the ticket broker canceled its plans to sell tickets to the general public on Friday.

media.caption: Ticketmaster has canceled its planned public sale of tickets to Taylor Swift’s latest tour, which was scheduled for Friday, after a series of problems with its earlier presales.
media.copyright: Terry Wyatt/Getty Images

results.title: Republicans Lay Out Biden Investigations, but Democrat-Aligned Groups Promise Counteroffensive

results.title: Key Allies Are Inching Away From Trump

results.title: Jay Leno Has Surgery for ‘Significant’ Burns From Car Fire
results.abstract: The comedian and TV host sustained mostly second-degree burns to his face, hands and chest. He was ‘cracking jokes’ after surgery to remove damaged skin tissue and place skin grafts, his doctor said.
